queries.queryString:
((_sourceCategory=*/github workflow_job)) //  workflow_run  

| json field=_raw "workflow_job.steps[*]" as steps_array nodrop
| parse regex field=steps_array "\"name\":\"(?<job_name>[^\"]+)\",\"status\":\"(?<job_status>[^\"]+)\",\"conclusion\":\"(?<job_conclusion>[^\"]+)\",\"number\":(?<job_number>\d+),\"started_at\":\"(?<job_started_at>[^\"]+)\",\"completed_at\":\"(?<job_completed_at>[^\"]+)\"" multi nodrop

| json field=_raw "repository.name" as repo_name
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.id" as workflow_id
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.name" as name
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.steps[*].conclusion" as conclusions nodrop
| where repo_name matches "{{repo_name}}"
| where job_conclusion = "failure"
| count by repo_name, job_name, name, workflow_id, _messageid
| urlencode(concat("_messageid=" , _messageid)) as search_query
| format ("https://<INSERT SUMO URL>/ui/#/search/@%d,%d@%s",querystarttime(),queryendtime(),search_query) as search_query_link
| tourl(search_query_link , workflow_id) as workflow_id
| fields -_count,_messageid,search_query_link,search_query

queries.queryString:
(((_sourceCategory=*/github))) *_ci_workflow.yaml scan_*_workflow.yaml
| json field=_raw "workflow_run.created_at"
| json field=_raw "workflow_run.display_title" as reason
| json field=_raw "workflow_run.conclusion" as conclusion
| json field=_raw "workflow_run.referenced_workflows[0].path" as referenced_workflows nodrop
| where referenced_workflows contains("dte-reusable-workflows")
| json field=_raw "repository.name" as repo_name
| json field=_raw "workflow_run.actor.login" as actor
| where action = "completed" and conclusion = "failure"
| parseDate(workflow_run.created_at, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss") as time_started
| parseDate(workflow_run.updated_at, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss") as time_completed
| ((time_completed - time_started)/1000) as duration_seconds

//| where repo_name matches "{{repo_name}}"
| count by repo_name, workflow_run.display_title, duration_seconds, _messageid
| urlencode(concat("_messageid=" , _messageid)) as search_query
| format ("https://<INSERT SUMO URL>/ui/#/search/@%d,%d@%s",querystarttime(),queryendtime(),search_query) as search_query_link
| tourl(search_query_link , "Drill Down") as search_query_link
| sort by duration_seconds
| fields -_count,_messageid,search_query

panels.title: Reusable Workflow Runs Completed - Hourly (Success/Failure)
panels.visualSettings: {"settings":{"line":{"chartType":"line","version":2,"configuration":{"seriesInfo":{"undefined":{"yAxis":0}}}},"area":{"chartType":"area","version":2,"configuration":{"seriesInfo":{"undefined":{"yAxis":0}}}},"bar":{"chartType":"bar","version":2,"configuration":{"seriesInfo":{"undefined":{"yAxis":0}}}},"column":{"chartType":"column","version":2,"configuration":{"seriesInfo":{"undefined":{"yAxis":0}}}},"pie":{"chartType":"pie","version":2,"configuration":{"seriesInfo":{"undefined":{"yAxis":0}}}},"table":{"chartType":"table","version":2,"configuration":{"seriesInfo":{"undefined":{"yAxis":0}}}},"map":{"chartType":"map","version":2,"configuration":{"seriesInfo":{"undefined":{"yAxis":0}}}},"sankey":{"chartType":"sankey","version":1,"configuration":{"seriesInfo":{"undefined":{"yAxis":0}}}}},"series":{},"color":{"family":"Diverging 2"},"overrides":[{"series":["success"],"queries":[],"properties":{"color":"#00a0d6"}},{"series":["failure"],"queries":[],"properties":{"color":"#f7995b"}}],"general":{"type":"column","displayType":"default","roundDataPoints":true,"fillOpacity":1,"mode":"timeSeries","noDataMessage":"✈️ This data must still be in transit"}}

queries.queryString:
(((_sourceCategory=*/github))) *_ci_workflow.yaml scan_*_workflow.yaml
| json field=_raw "workflow_run.display_title" as reason
| json field=_raw "workflow_run.conclusion" as conclusion
| json field=_raw "workflow_run.referenced_workflows[0].path" as referenced_workflows nodrop
| where referenced_workflows contains("dte-reusable-workflows")
| json field=_raw "repository.name" as repo_name
| where action = "completed"
| timeslice 1h
| count by _timeslice, conclusion
| transpose row _timeslice column conclusion

panels.title: Total Jobs Exectued
panels.visualSettings: {"title":{"fontSize":14},"general":{"type":"pie","displayType":"default","roundDataPoints":true,"fillOpacity":1,"startAngle":270,"innerRadius":"60%","maxNumOfSlices":10,"mode":"distribution","noDataMessage":"✈️ This data must still be in transit"},"legend":{"enabled":true,"verticalAlign":"bottom","fontSize":12,"maxHeight":50,"showAsTable":false,"wrap":true},"axes":{"axisX":{"titleFontSize":12,"labelFontSize":12},"axisY":{"titleFontSize":12,"labelFontSize":12}},"series":{},"color":{"family":"METRIC_DEFAULT"}}

queries.queryString:
(((_sourceCategory=*/github workflow_job)))
| json auto extractarrays
| json field=_raw "repository.name" as repo_name
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.conclusion" as conclusion
| isEmpty(conclusion) as is_empty
| if(is_empty, "null", conclusion) as conclusion
| where action = "completed"
| json field=_raw "repository.name" as repo_name
| where repo_name matches "{{repo_name}}"
| count by conclusion
| sort by _count

((((_sourceCategory=*/github workflow_job))))
| json auto extractarrays
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.conclusion" as conclusion
| where action = "completed"
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.run_attempt" as attempts
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.workflow_name" as  workflow_name

| parseDate(workflow_job.started_at, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss") as time_started
| parseDate(workflow_job.completed_at, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss") as time_completed
| (((time_completed - time_started)/1000)/60) as duration
| json field=_raw "repository.name" as repo_name
| where repo_name matches "{{repo_name}}"
| count by duration, repository.name
| avg(duration) as average_duration
| round(average_duration)

panels.title: Mean Job Duration By Step Name (Top 5)

queries.queryString:
((((_sourceCategory=*/github workflow_job))))
| json auto extractarrays
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.conclusion" as conclusion
| where action = "completed"
| json field=_raw "repository.name" as repo_name
| where repo_name matches "{{repo_name}}"
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.run_attempt" as attempts
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.workflow_name" as  workflow_name

| parseDate(workflow_job.started_at, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss") as time_started
| parseDate(workflow_job.completed_at, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss") as time_completed
| (((time_completed - time_started)/1000)/60) as duration
| count by duration, workflow_name
| avg(duration) as average_duration by workflow_name
| round(average_duration, 2) as average_duration

(((_sourceCategory=*/github workflow_*)))
| json auto extractarrays
| json field=_raw "repository.name" as repo_name
| where repo_name matches "{{repo_name}}"
//| where repository.name = "dte-reusable-workflows"
| json field=_raw "sender.login" as user
| count by user
| sort by _count

sourceDefinition.query:
((_sourceCategory=*/github workflow_job)) //  workflow_run  
| json field=_raw "repository.name" as repo_name
